name: rnr
description: Event based actor model providing supervision, hot-swap and location transparency

scripts.test-perf: cp -r lib/* dist && babel es6 --source-maps inline --out-dir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test/perf --reporter spec
scripts.test: cp -r lib/* dist && babel es6 --source-maps inline --out-dir dist && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha test/unit --reporter spec
